row.process: ! ------------------------------------------- ! Parameter fÃ¼r JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS definieren: ! ------------------------------------------- :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "SPIEGELAPP" :SET &PARAFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.PAR" :SET &DUMPFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.DMP" :SET &EXPSCRIPT# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#" ! ---------------------------------- :SET &LOGFILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&EXPSCRIPT#.log" :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_CREATEFOLDER !:INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_DELETEFILE "EDIZIONE" = "&EXP_PATH#/dmp/&DUMPFILE#" :INC JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS ! ----------------------------- ! Parameterdatei zusammenbauen: ! ----------------------------- cat << __EOF__ > &PARAFILE# TABLES=PDB.TPDPARTNER, PDB.TPDEMAILADR, PDB.TPDWEBADR, PDB.TPDPOSTADR, PDB.TPDAENDERUNG, PDB.TPDBANKVERB, PDB.TPDVORGANG, PDB.TPDTELEFONADR, PDB.TPDPARTNRMAX, PDB.TPDORB, PDB.TPDFUNKTION, PDB.TPDFUNKTIONSART, PDB.TPDORBART, PDB.TPDORBAEND, PDB.TPDHINWEIS, PDB.TPDHINWREGEL, PDB.TPDMIG_PERSNR, PDB.TPDSCHLUESSEL, PDB.TPDDUBLREF, PDB.TPDVERSION, PDB.TPDBERUF DUMPFILE=&DUMPFILE# REUSE_DUMPFILES=YES DIRECTORY=&DIRECTORY# FLASHBACK_TIME="TO_TIMESTAMP('&TS#','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')" LOGFILE=&DIRECTORY#_LOG:&EXPSCRIPT#_&TIMESTAMP_AM#.log CONTENT=DATA_ONLY QUERY=PDB.TPDFUNKTION:"WHERE ORBART = 'ADMA' AND GUELTIG_BIS > CURRENT_DATE" __EOF__ :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_RUNEXPORT
